1.content:
I had a nightmare that morning. I dreamed about my ex-husband, the moment he left me with the kids. "You have to manage things on your own now Karen. I'm off to Mexico with Dianne," he said to me. I begged him to stay and tried to grab him preventing him from leaving the house, but my hands went right through him as if he was a ghost. "Mom, what is happening?," I looked behind me and saw my son and daughter run down the stairs. "Go back to bed children," the words left my mouth, but I didn't want to say it. "Harry, please stay with us," I turned towards the man in the doorway, but he was already gone. "Don't worry Karen some day you'll be.....THE WINNER!!!!!!," a voice thundered in my head.

I jumped up and looked around me. I was in my kitchen, no young children and no loud voices. In front of me was an nearly empty bottle. "...and the winner of $5000,- is...," the quiz-master on the screen said. Great I had been drinking again, and must have fallen asleep watching TV. When was I ever getting over the divorce? It had been nearly 10 years since Harry left and I still had problems with it. And why? He was an asshole and left me for some young bimbo with fake tits bigger than her head. Every year on the same date I wanted to get drunk just to forget al of it. Yesterday had been that day.


"You know maybe I should forget about men!," I said angry and punched the bottle off the table. Maybe I shouldn't have... The bottle landed right next to the TV and smashed into a million pieces. The glass fell down to the kitchen floor and drops of liquid splashed onto the screen. "Oh...great," I sighed and stood up waggling. I still suffered the consequences from the drinks I had last night. I shut the TV off and began cleaning the floor. After a couple of minutes the job was done. I swiped the liquid of the screen and put the TV back on. The screen only showed snow, thinking it was just a slight malfunction I gave the box a little slap. Nothing happened, then all of a sudden the screen began to flash in every thinkable color and a beam shoot out!?

I stared as the beam hit the remote on the table. It only last a couple of seconds. I didn't now what this was all about, but I guessed it was a little 'leftover' from my drinking adventure. After a minute I tried the TV again, this time it didn't even give snow. "Damn thing!," I grabbed the remote off the table. It felt weird it was a bit warm in my hand, but it cooled off pretty quickly. I looked it over and noticed only one button and a switch. "Didn't it used to have like 12 buttons or something?," I thought to myself. When I looked closer I saw the button had a flame printed on it, the switch had a 'G' printed on it's left side and an 'S' on it's right side. "G and S? What is this?," I was confused. One minute ago I saw a weird beam coming out of a broken TV and now the remote got itself a make-over!?


When I turned the thing around to look at the front side my finger pressed the button on top. There was a bright flash and I felt a cold shiver going through my body. "What the...," I looked around me and noticed the room made a little 'jump'. It was like it grew a little. I was convinced the remote had something to do with it. I pressed the button on the remote again. The same strange light filled my vision and I had the same weird feeling in my stomach. I looked around me and noticed everything had grown again! This was weird, I made my way to the standing mirror in the hallway. The furniture I passed on the way all seemed much bigger than before. I looked at myself in the large mirror.

My long reddish brown hair looked like a bird's nest, I really looked like hell. My bathrobe was almost reaching the ground and the sleeves seemed longer. Maybe it wasn't everything else that grew, I was smaller! I untied my bathrobe. My bra was barely filled and my panties were almost sliding off. This wasn't real, I was still dreaming! I looked at the remote again, which looked much bigger itself, I began to understand what the 'G' & 'S' stood for. The S was probably 'shrink' cause I was definitely a lot smaller, maybe close to 4ft. So I had some idea what would happen if I switched over to 'G'. It sure was worth giving it a try so I flipped the switch and hit the 'fire' button.


Again a feeling came over me, but this time it felt warm and pleasant. It was such an arousing feeling I stroked my skin with my free hand and looked into the mirror. I watched the sleeves of my bathrobe creep up my arms and my breasts began to fill up my bra again. My panties slid back in place. The whole process felt so great I decided to bring this to a higher level. I kept firing till I was over a foot taller than my normal height. It was so surreal! My breasts were spilling out of their cups, I always had quite some flesh with my D cup, but now they seemed even larger, My body lay on a few pounds the last few years, but I still had a good figure. It was almost right to stay this size!

I was planning to restore myself and turn away from the mirror, but I couldn't resist giving it one more shot. Looking at my 'new' reflection I fired another burst at myself. Again I enjoyed the pleasant feeling of growth, but after a foot or so my chest ached. My breasts felt like they were going to explode. They were already a tight fit for my bra, but this extra growth spurt was making it unbearable. I couldn't hold it much longer, so I put the remote down and barely managed to take of my bra.

I sighed in relief and looked back into the mirror. I was treated with a welcome sight. My breasts looked so big, of course they hadn't actually grown larger in proportion, but comparing myself to the 'shrunken' furniture made especially 'them' stand out. Now my ample boobs looked like footballs. They weren't boobs or tits anymore. No, people would call them hooters or juggs. My 'new' boobs weren't fake hoovering porn star boobs like my husband's bimbo had. No these babies were all natural. I stroked my soft jelly mammaries, kneading them in my hands pushing them against each other to form an incredible cleavage.

While enjoying my new found height all sorts of thoughts ran through my mind, how I could use this remote for my own good. But, I also had the feeling I should share my knowledge with someone or even test it on someone besides myself! But, before I could share anything I had to do something about my 'improved' self. I wasn't happy with the thought of shrinking back again, but I had to. If someone saw me like this they would surely freak out. I chuckled, it would be fun to see people's faces when they're suddenly confronted with a 7ft tall amazon. But, I would save those fun moments for some other time. Now I had other things in mind.

A moment later I returned myself to my former size. I felt disappointed to be my normal 'short' self again, but it would have to do for now. I walked to my bedroom, got rid of the bathrobe, put on a shirt, some jeans and was ready to go. I didn't think about taking a shower, at that moment I had my mind on the remote and what fun things I could do with it. I didn't make me forget the tears and bad dreams, but now I had something else to focus on.

I went...
1.title: Karen's Sad Story

choices: ...I heard Tina had a friend over
...I used the remote to shrink myself
...I used the remote to grow myself
11.content:
I thought about my options again. Should I really share this thing with someone else? Or should I just keep it to myself? I literally walked around in circles for about five minutes. My decision was clear, I would stay in the house and wouldn't share it with the outside world. At least for the moment. No, it was best to keep the secret in the house, maybe sharing it with one of my children or maybe even test it on them.

That last thought kept going through my mind. Changing Matt's or Tina's size would be interesting. I walked out of my bedroom into the hallway and started to head up the stairs. Maybe it wasn't such a great idea to show the remote off to anyone, but then again it would ease my mind a bit.

A moment later I...
11.title: What Is Upstairs?

111.content:
I made up my mind and slowly approached Matt's bedroom. I could hear him snoring even though the door was closed. A habit he inherited from his father of course. I carefully opened the door. My son was fast asleep. This early in the morning not even a foghorn would be able to wake him up. Matt was pretty lazy, but he was a good boy. Not much of a man yet, still living with his mom.

I wondered sometimes if he would even leave the house before he turned thirty. I didn't fool myself into believing he wanted to leave, I was far to good for him. Maybe it was time to teach him how to manage on his own, or maybe give him more reason not to leave and spend some more time with his loving mother. Both options were tempting, although I preferred keeping him around the house for now.

Matt's body was only half covered by the blanket. He was only wearing his boxers, a perfect chance to do some experimentation with the remote.

I decided to...
111.title: Matt Is Still Asleep

1111.content:
Using Matt as a test subject for the remote didn't seem such a bad idea. While he slept, I could make him much smaller than I dared to shrink myself, just to see what the device was capable of. Then use the growth function to return him to normal size, when I was done experimenting. If I was quiet enough I might be able to test the remote without even waking him up. Eager to proceed with my plan, I aimed the remote and pressed the button.

I watched in amazement as the beam hit my son's shoulder and he slowly began to shrink. Although I had shrunk myself just minutes before, it was a whole new experience to see another person shrinking. Matt’s head slid off the pillow and his legs began moving up to the center of the bed as his size dwindled. After reducing his body to about 3 feet I paused to examine him. His boxers had mostly slid off.

Matt was still snoring, but the volume had turned down a bit. Funny, how he now sounded like a sleeping 8 year old. It brought back feelings and memories I had long since forgotten. The thoughts made me smile. Matt almost looked like a little kid again. A kid that needed a shave, but his new size made the illusion pretty real. I knelt beside the bed and leaned over my shrunken son. He looked so cute and peaceful, I had to resist not to hug him.

I decided to take a peek under the covers. I carefully pulled off the sheets to reveal my son's lower body. His boxers were still covering his privates, but it looked more like a towel than actual clothing on him. How would he react if he woke up to find his large mother looking down on him. Maybe it would scare him to dead or, what seemed more likely considering he took after his father, he would think it was just some crazy dream.

For now I...
1111.title: Shrinking Matt

11111.content:
He looked so cute. I watched him for a few minutes until he started to move, I then thought to myself, what should I do now? Leaving him at this height would be fun, but he'll probably freak out. I wanted him to be smaller, but not that fast. I switched the remote back to 'growth' and grew him back to about 4'6''.

I thought about leaving him at this height, but got a much better idea. It would be fun to start him at Tina's height and slowly shrink him down from there. Excited I began firing once more and watched as he grew to 5'6". Now he was the same height as his younger sister. Wouldn't that be amusing to watch. Maybe once I observed his reaction I could grow Tina to his old height of 5'9''.

Thinking of doing that, I couldn't help myself. I aimed the remote, and gave myself a short burst. Enjoying the rush as I grew to 6'1'' - now a foot taller I felt ready for anything. My clothes felt extremely tight and I had to loosen up a few buttons, I could see a few tears. It was a small sacrifice to make for all the excitement I'd have towering over my kids.

I decided to go back downstairs and start making some breakfast. Wouldn't want anyone to wake up before the big surprise. I couldn't wait to see my kids reactions. I sat at the table, adjusting to my extra inches, and waiting for Matt and Tina.
11111.title: A Better Idea

choices: ...follow Matt and shrink him some more
111111.content:
I heard a shout of surprise coming from upstairs...apparently Matt ran into Tina and both of them fell on their butts. The usual shouting and screaming began. I sighed and got up, bumping my knee against the table. Cursing in silence, I hurried upstairs. They were both still arguiing who walked into who. I waited for a moment, on the last step, before 'checking' on them.

It was weird seeing Matt equal height with his sister, but apparently he hadn't noticed yet. "What's going on here?," both heads turned to my direction. "Mom that stupid oaf..." Tina stopped mid-sentence as I took the final step. They stared at me, something was off and they knew it. I silently laughed and took a few steps towards them. I broke the silence telling them I had breakfast ready.

They looked each other in the eye and then I heard a surprised gasp come from my son. He finally realized he was directly looking in his sister's eyes. I wanted to keep the mystery alive so I went downstairs and sat at the table. A moment later we were all at the table eating, Matt and Tina just ate quietly. Their faces straight, just looking at their plates.

After ten minutes Matt got up and said he was gonna get dressed and ready for work. Tina said nothing and just stared at him leaving the room. I had to strain myself from bursting in to laughter. When I heard the bathroom door shut I knew it was time for the next step.

It was time to...
111111.title: Matt Ran Into His Sister

1111112.content:
It was hard not to smile as I watched my daughter, Tina staring after her sibling. Her eyes were narrow and full of confusion, her face conflicting between blank and questioning. Her fork was resting in her breakfast, the food forgotten as she finally turned back, shaking her head.

"That was weird," she said as she returned her attention to the plate in front of her. She dropped her fork and picked up her coffee mug taking a long sip, probably hoping a jolt of caffeine would return things to normal. I knew otherwise.

"What was weird, honey?" I asked suppressing a wide grin as Tina set her mug back to the table and stared at me. She licked her lips and I could see that she was mentally debating whether to share her thoughts. She probably thought that she was seeing things, maybe still asleep and dreaming. I took a drink of my own coffee, waiting for her to come to grips with what she had seen.

"Matt," she finally said glancing at the doorway again, perhaps making sure that her brother had not returned. She leaned in, her voice now a whisper. "He looked... different." Her eyes were huge as she stared at me and she was chewing on her lower lip.

"Different?" I asked feigning ignorance. I was having way too much fun with this. "What do you mean?"

"He seemed... shorter," she finally said shifting in her chair. She swallowed and shook her head. "Upstairs, when we both got up off the floor and we were standing face to face, I swear I was staring straight into his eyes. I must have been still half asleep." Tina chuckled nervously and took another sip of coffee. "Weird, hunh?" I grinned and shook my head, my hand slipping into my pocket and pulling out the remote.

"Not so weird," I said holding up the TV remote. Tina stared at it as I brushed my thumb lightly over the buttons. I quickly told Tina what had happened and what I had been doing over the past few minutes since I had gotten up; the strange flash of light and how the remote now seemed able to alter the size of whoever it was pointed at. She stared at me skeptically, but quickly raised her hands warding me off as I volunteered to give her a demonstration, pointing the remote at her with a wicked grin.

"No thanks," she said hesitantly, and I could tell that she thought maybe I was a little crazy. At that point I was determined to prove my point and pushed my chair back from the table, getting up.

"I'll show you," I said as I headed out of the kitchen and towards the stairs. After a moment I heard my daughter following, her slippered feet padding behind me as we both ascended the staircase. When we got to the second floor Matt was just coming out of the bathroom. His hair was still damp as steam swirled from the doorway in his wake. I giggled to see his tee shirt hanging baggily from his shoulders, his right hand knotting his boxers at his waist to keep them from falling. He looked up and blushed as he saw us standing at the end of the hall.

"Everything okay, baby?" I said with a wide, wicked grin taking in the slightly shrunken form of my son. I heard Tina's gasp as she stepped beside me. Matt licked his lips and looked down at his over-sized clothes.

"I must be losing weight," he said as he hoisted his boxers higher. He looked up embarrassed and I heard Tina giggle.

"You don't know the half of it," I said as I raised the remote and pointed it at my son, pressing the button...
1111112.title: Let Tina In On My Secret

choices: Matt and Tina notice the change
Matt and Tina don't notice the change
1111113.content:
It was time to initiate phase two of my little experiment. While I now stood at 6'1" and Matt had been reduced to 5'6" to match his sister, it was high time Tina got to know what it felt like to be taller than her brother.

While Matt was currently in the bathroom, I began preparing the remote underneath the table. Tina didn't seem to pay me any mind as she turned back to her breakfast. I couldn't grow her just yet as it would become to obvious. I needed a good distraction.

"Hey Tina?"

"Yea, mom." she answered.

"Could you go into the pantry and get the salt? I need a little bit more for my breakfast." I asked.

"Sure." Tina sighed.

This was perfect! I'd now be able to grow her without her noticing. The salt sat on the top shelf o the pantry, a place that she struggled to reach and I couldn't without a chair at my natural height. I could barely contain my excitement as I watched Tina rise to her feet and make her way over to the pantry.

She slid the door open and looked around for a bit before grumbling. The salt was on the top shelf. Right where I left it. Tina began to stand on her tippy-toes and reached up as high as she could. Little did she knew reaching the top shelf would no longer be an issue.

With her back turned and a grin on my face, I aimed the remote... and fired. I looked on with mad glee as Tina's t-shirt and boxers began to fill out as her height rose. She didn't seem to notice which was good and her height finally capped off at Matt's original 5'9".

Before Tina knew it, she was able to grab the salt with relative ease. She then walked back over to me and I thanked her accordingly. We both finished our breakfast soon after and I saw Tina make her way upstairs.

I was a bit disappointed that neither of my children noticed my height change. I could tell just by looking at them that they felt something was off but quickly pushed that thought away. Oh, well. At least I got to see Matt's brief shock when he noticed he and Tina literally saw eye to eye.

As I began to wash dishes the familiar sound of shouting filled my ears. I couldn't be more happy. I ditched the dishes and made my way upstairs to see Tina holding a set of clothes, banging on the bathroom door.

"Hurry up in there! I need to use the bathroom too, ya know!"

I couldn't hear what Matt said on the other side, all I did know was that he managed to annoy Tina even more. She began to bang on the door with much more force this time. She wanted the bathroom and wanted it now.

I continued to watch unnoticed... then a happy smile broke out on my face.

Matt was opening the door.
1111113.title: Phase 2

choices: Tina relishes being taller than her brother
Karen decides to use the remote again
11111131.content:
"What the hell was taking you long!" Tina shouted. "You're like a girl on prom night. What were you doing in there, trying on make-up?!"

Matt didn't look all too pleased being compared to girl on prom night. "You'd know all about make-up considering you can't go a day without! You wear so much of it I sometimes confuse you for a clown!"

"Why you little...!"

The two continued to bicker back and fourth, completely unaware of my presence. I was nearly floored by the bizarre sight. Seeing Tina actually taller than Matt was strange. I was so used to their original heights that this was new territory for me. And boy did I love it.

Seeing Matt with his khakis cuffed at the ankles with his red shirt hanging a little looser than normal was hilarious. Tina gave off a more odd impression because she actually filled out her clothes now. Still, the two had yet to notice the change because of their constant fighting. I just hoped it would end soon so I could glimpse the reaction I craved.

"And another thing...!" Matt suddenly paused his tirade when something finally caught his eye. He knew for a fact that he was taller than Tina. Yet for some reason he was looking up slightly to meet her gaze. That... That wasn't right. The bizarre feeling he felt from before had returned.

It had been nagging him ever since he woke up this morning. Something was clearly screwy around here. When he bumped into Tina this morning they literally met eye to eye instead of eye to nose. Then when he saw his mother, something just felt wrong. Like the natural order had been disturbed. And finally here he was face to face with Tina again. Only this time eyes didn't meet and he didn't tower per the norm. Instead, she was the one towering.

"What's wrong? Cat got your tongue? Maybe you shouldn't start something you... Aren't... Prepared to-" Tina's smug rant suddenly ceased as well. Had Matt always been so... Short?! Wait, something wasn't right here. Tina knew for certain he was taller than her so why all of a sudden was he looking up at her?

I watched from the sidelines as the conversation died and silence reigned. Was this actually happening? Were they finally starting to take notice. I found myself leaning in as Tina extended her hand outward from her head to his and found her brother didn't quite measure up

Both siblings gasped as the realization hit them. Tina was taller than him. What? When? How? Matt had always been the tallest. He was the elder brother and grew the most after all. So why now all f a sudden did Tina eclipse him? Did she have some sort of growth spurt over night? Yeah! That must be it. There was no other logic explanation. Although this was pushing it.

As I watched both my children my smile lit up. I couldn't wait to see what happened next.
11111131.title: Big Changes

choices: Matt has to go to work
111111312.content:
While I was doing my best impression of a fly on the wall, I could hear Tina begin to giggle. If I hazard to guess I'd say she's enjoying her new stature. That was something I too could understand.

"Well it looks like you don't quite measure up in more big-- Oh I'm sorry. Little brother." Tina teased as she ruffled Matt's hair.

Matt quickly swatted it away in frustration. He hated people touching his hair. "Don't patronize me!"

"Awww!!! But your just so cute and tiny." Tina continued. For years Matt teased her about her height, calling her teeny tiny Tina and the like. It felt good to have the roles reversed and get a little payback.

"I'm not cute!" Matt roared. "Would you get serious for a moment. Can't you see something is clearly wrong here?"

"Little Matty's just upset he's not the biggest anymore. Sorry squirt, but you're not the alpha here anymore!" Tina explained. She wouldn't admit it, but she also felt something was amiss since this morning. She couldn't put her finger on it, but right now she didn't care. She'd finally outgrown her brother and she was going to enjoy it.

"Tina...?" Matt said through grit teeth.

"What's that? I can't here you from down there." Tina grinned as she placed a hand to her ear.

While I watched the exchange between my children it took all I had not to laugh and blow my cover. Tina was clearly enjoying herself at Matt's expense. From my hiding spot I thought I could see the steam coming from his nose as his face grew red in anger. It looked like he was about to turn into the Hulk.

"Tina I'm warning you --"

"Of what?" Tina interrupted. "I'm the ''big'' sister here and it's high time you showed me the proper respect."

"What?" Matt said blandly, his anger temporarily forgotten.

"You heard me. I'm the alpha now and that means I'm in charge." Tina smiled.

"You can't be serious." Matt said in the same bland tone. Tina had to be joking. Something was seriously wrong with the natural order and all she cared about was making stupid jokes.

Tina's grin turned feral. "Oh I'm very serious. Since when's the last time you did something nice for me? Can you tell me because I can't."

Matt simply rolled his eyes. "What about that time I bought you that headset for your birthday?"

"That doesn't count." Tina huffed. "That was my birthday, you're supposed to do nice things for me. I mean when's the last time you did something for me that wasn't an obligation."

Matt was stumped.

"See! You can't tell me can you?" Matt said nothing. "So. Since I'm now the alpha I've decided your going to do something nice for me. You're going to give me a nice long foot massage."

I listened to Tina words and had to cover my mouth with my hands to prevent a giggle from escaping. The look on Matt's face was priceless. He looked like a deer in the headlights. This experiment was turning out far better than I'd hoped. Matt's face soon turned into an angry scowl and I could tell things were about to escalate.

"No way!" Matt shouted.

"Yes way!" Tina shot back.

I couldn't wait to see things explode.
111111312.title: Little Big Sister!

choices: ...make the changes a bit more obvious this time
111112.content:
I called for breakfast and heard the both of them slowly get out of bed. I was covering myself behind the newspaper and looked over to the door expecting someone to come through. First off was my Tina her pajamas looked a bit small on her I could see her tight stomach through the mid-rift of her shirt and pants. I talked to her when she came by the table.

"It's a nice day today isn't it." She mumbled something back in return. "You look different today," she ignored me and kept eating. Eventually she finished and put her dish in the dish washer. But as luck would have Matt was coming into the kitchen as well.

I was waiting with anticipation for there reaction when. They just mumbled to one another and continued on their separate ways. Matt was looking utterly hilarious, his pants covered his feet his sleeves went passed his hands and he just shuffled along holding his pants up. He grabbed a plate and sat at the table across from me and asked. "Hey Mom did you stretch out some of my clothes?"

"I don't think so." He looked adorable I couldn't believe he didn't notice. So I told him he looked well today and I put down the newspaper He looked at me and I think somewhere in his mind he noticed something different, but he said nothing.

"You know Matt I'm taking these new supplements that apparently enhance your body with things like immunity, weight, posture and height," I said.

He just looked up from his food and said "That's great mom."

I was shocked My experiment had failed, so it was time to make the subjects somewhat aware. Matt had gotten up and was putting his plate in the dishwasher when I went up to him and put my hand on his shoulder. The look he gave me was priceless He just looked up to my face, I smiled a little and waved at him then he stood back looked at my feet then all the way up to my face and terror turned to surprise then he said. "Holy shit! Mom those pills must really work, Damn you're like a basketball player or something."

I just blushed and said thanks, I loved the attention and admiration being showed to me. And it felt really good to tower over Matt who hadn't treated me with the respect lately. Now we didn't even see eye to eye he had to look up to see my face.

Everyone went on with their daily business and at night I decided to...
111112.title: Well That Was Odd.

choices: Matt was standing behind me. He saw the whole thing!
I went to Matt's room and did the same thing to him.
I stepped on something, which made Tina wake up.
I decided just to stick with Tina for now.
1111122.content:
I was honestly very disappointed with both Matt and Tina's reactions this morning. Neither one of them seemed to be particularly aware of what was going on until I made an effort to point out what was going on to Matt, and the two of them never saw that they were now the same height. That was especially disappointing; I was hoping to see how they would react, but nothing of note happened.

So, later that night, once the kids were back in bed. I had shrunk myself back to my normal size; I had ripped two shirts already, and didn't want to ruin more clothes just yet. I crept out into the hallway, and slowly pushed up the door to Tina's room. As I expected, she was sprawled out all over her bed, fast asleep. With a smile, I pulled the remote out of my bathrobe pocket, and zapped Tina with it. The girl began to shrink, the tight pajamas she was wearing becoming loose and ill-fitting in a matter of seconds. I stopped once I estimated that she was maybe my height, give or take an inch. Just like Matt last night, Tina didn't seem to notice being shrunk; she continued sleeping without a care in the world.

Smiling, I pocketed the remote, and turned to head to Matt's room.
1111122.title: Shrink Them

choices: ...between my bountiful breasts for safe keeping
11111221.content:
Snickering to myself I turned around only to bump into Matt. He whispered angrily to me. "Supplements my ass! You just used that remote to change up everyone's sizes! You better change me back!"

"Well I'm glad somebody caught on. It was killing me that no one noticed, but I'm afraid I'm not done with my fun just yet.

I aimed the remote and shot Matt with a full blast. Realizing what I was doing he quickly started to move down the hallway towards me. However, with every step he made he lost inches by the time he reached me his arms were raised up and hands grasping at my stomach. Slowly he sunk into his clothing his head disappearing down his shirt until all there was left was a pile of clothes.

I stopped shrinking him and crouched down, I started to sift through the clothing when suddenly a three quarters of an inch tall Matt ran of his sleeve and started to punch my big toe which now dwarfed him. And I couldn't hold in my laughter, I had my hand on my mouth keeping in the the giggles. I got down further and listened to him and his grunts and noises.

"Goddamn it Mom! You're so fucking big, You'll pay for this. I could have watched this for hours I even took out my phone and recorded him, when after a couple of minutes he stopped and noticed me. "You better not be recording this mom," he cried out.

"Awww but you're so cute."

"Stop it this isn't funny!".

"Awe come here little guy," I grabbed him and brought him up to my face,He was so small my nails were twice his size. "What are you going to do with me?"

"That's a good question little man," the breath from my mouth almost knocked him over. "What can I do with you till tomorrow, oh I know.

I went down the stairs into the kitchen. Opening a few drawers I found what I was looking for. I found some old silly putty, rolled it out and wrapped Matt in up to his armpit's.

He squeaked out to me. "You can't do this!."

To which I responded. "I already have." He must have been fuming. Walking back up the stairs I yawned, all this excitement was quite tiring. It was probably best to head for bed for tonight.

I just needed a place to put Matt for the night.

So I pasted my putty coated tiny son...
11111221.title: No Witnesses

choices: I decided to at least admit they were looking different
I kept playing dumb with them
They still looked a bit too big
11111222.content:
Matt slept in his bed sprawled out half in half out the bed his computer still on. I started to snoop and opened his browser and what I saw surprised me a little. What Matt had typed into his browser was tall busty women.

I'm going to fulfill his wish and then some, I pulled out the remote and shrunk Matt down to 4' 6" a whole foot shorter than his sister. I put away the remote and went to bed.

info.brief_description: A strange beam transforms Karen's TV remote into a size-changing device
info.description:
READ THE RULES! And stop adding one-sentence chapters just to have more choices. I'll delete them!

Yes, The Size Remote - Mom Version is back. I've digged through the archives and was able to retrieve most of the original chapters. A few chapters are edited or were untraceable, but I've tried to keep it in it's original state as much as possible.
I'd like to thank all the original contributors including; Footlover, Markus, Servious, Theperson Wizard-s and all the others.


Karen lives a normal 'boring' live with her son Matt and her daughter Tina in a peacefull neighborhood on the edge of town. She is divorced and her ex left years ago. One morning her life changes as her TV remote turns into a device that can grow/shrink anyone and almost everything.

For more info on the characters read The Size Remote  


If you add to the story, please follow these rules:

- STAY IN FIRST PERSON, NO POV SWITCHES
- don't end the story!
- don't add new functions to the remote. It either makes people shrink or grow!
- the remote doesn't work on clothing
- keep the toilet-stuff to a minimum
- no killing
- no characters under the age of 18
- no one sentence chapters
- no male gay
- anything contrary to these rules or which in my opinion harms the interactive will be deleted or edited
